price: Ese ubwo ntibakwiye kugarukira Allah ngo banamusabe imbabazi? Kandi Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimpuhwe.
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتُوبُونَ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَهُۥۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: afalā yatūbūna ilā al-lahi wayastaghfirūnahu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
